document_data.name: Jedro Broamyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Jedro "Longhorns" Broamyr''' was the proprietor of [[The Figureheadless]] tavern in [[Velen]], a city on the [[Dragon's Head Peninsula]] in [[Tethyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Jedro was a mountain of a man with huge muscled arms, mammoth hands, and hanging mustache that draped his mouth.
document_data.History: "Longhorns" Broamyr ran his tavern catering to pirates and brigands after coming to an agreement with the clientele to never drug any food or drinks served at The Figureheadless. Jedro's establishment was listed as a tavern of note in [[Volothamp Geddarm]]'s guide to the [[Lands of Intrigue]] published in the late 14{{th}} century DR.
